Class Corpus

  • java.lang.Object
    • crf.Corpus

  • public class Corpus
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private edu.cmu.minorthird.text.MutableTextBase tb 
      private edu.cmu.minorthird.text.MutableTextLabels tl 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Corpus(java.lang.String textDir)
      Load an unlabeled corpus without specifying a tokenizer
      Corpus(java.lang.String textDir, java.lang.String labelDir)
      Load a labeled corpus without specified tokenizer(i.e a default regex tokenizer will be used)
      Corpus(java.lang.String textDir, java.lang.String labelDir, edu.cmu.minorthird.text.Tokenizer tok)
      Load a labeld corpus using a specified tokenizer; in this project, it is recommended to use crf.TwitterTokenizer
      Corpus(java.lang.String textDir, edu.cmu.minorthird.text.Tokenizer tok)
      Load an unlabeled corpus, using specified tokenizer
